short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks news articles for political bias.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daratos determines the political bias of news articles. You can use Daratos to read more from an opposing political party to make sure that you are getting all sides of a story. 

To use this extension, go to any news publisher on the web whether that is from your favorite news source or one that you have never heard of. Once you have found an article that you are interested in, press the Daratos logo on the top right of your browser window and wait for the bias to be determined.

Uses "The Bipartisan Press'" AI to determine bias.
